recipe.title: Emmas Slow Roast Beef
recipe.step: Remove roast from wrapper and remove strings. Place in the centre of slow cooker. Put bay leaf in the bottom. Spread mustard over top and sprinkle herbs evenly over the top. Generously add salt and pepper all over top and close lid. Cook for at least six hours. Once done remove from slow cooker and cover with foil and keep warm. Use a sieve and drain all liquid into a sauce pan. Turn the pan on low heat. In a small cup mix tapioca flour with a couple of table spoons of water and mix until there are no lumps. While stirring juices, pour in tapioca flour mixture and continue to stir until sauce thickens. Keep sauce warm. Using two forks shred meat (you may need a knife for parts of it.) Pour sauce over meat reserving some for extra gravy. Serve hot with mash spud and other veggies. Yum yum!
